duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive administrative support to executives and teams, ensuring smooth operations and efficient workflow.
Utilize strong data entry skills to manage records, update spreadsheets, and create presentations for various meetings and reports.
Demonstrate expertise in using Microsoft Office suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint), QuickBooks, and other relevant software tools.
Coordinate travel arrangements for team members, ensuring timely and cost-effective bookings.
Monitor office supply levels and handle shipping logistics, ensuring a well-stocked and organized office environment.
Work effectively in a team-oriented environment, exchanging information, and collaborating with colleagues to achieve common goals.
Handle sensitive and confidential information with the utmost discretion and in accordance with company policies.
Utilize exceptional customer service skills to interact with clients, vendors, and internal staff, addressing inquiries and resolving issues promptly and professionally.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required (Associate's degree preferred)
